text: Hi everyone! Does anyone have any recommendations for embedding an instagram feed? I searched this slack and it looks like <https://github.com/stevenschobert/instafeed.js|this instafeed.js plugin> was the last thing recommended a year ago. I was just wondering if anyone has done anything more recently (i.e. since Insta deprecated their API). Thanks :relaxed: :sparkles:

checkout this, but this is also similar to instasfeed
<https://www.jqueryscript.net/social-media/instagram-feed-hashtag-story.html>
